alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 10:57PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Smoke from Wildfire on the Santa Gertrudis Division of the King Ranch to Reach Northeast Brooks and Northwest Kenedy County... A wildfire...known as the Borrega Fire...near the Kleberg and Jim Wells County line has been spreading smoke south and southwest late this evening...and a surge of wind from the north and northeast will bring the smoke and potentially some of the wildfire into far northwestern Kenedy and far northeastern Brooks County...including State Highway 285...by midnight and perhaps into the early morning hours of Thursday. Travelers along State Road 285 between Falfurrias and Riviera should be alert to lowered visibility as low as 1 mile...and residents in the area should remain alert to possible rapid spread of the ongoing fire due to north-northeast winds that could gust to 25 to 30 mph through 1 AM or later.
